description: Chinese Export Partial Dinner Service, about 1780, porcelain with arms of owner, Duque de Agrada, on all pieces; made for the Portuguese Market
medium: Porcelain with enamel and gilded decoration
object_name: Lidded tureen, Chinese Export Partial Dinner Service
text: Displayed here are several pieces from a large dinner service made for the Spanish Duke of Agrada.
title: Lidded tureen, Chinese Export Partial Dinner Service
